definition: parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear

sentences.english: Also Massimo Moratti has announced officially his new coach.
sentences.chinese: 莫拉蒂亲自官方宣布了他的新教练。

sentences.english: It was designed by Master Monk Xuanzang of the Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 是唐代的玄奘大师亲自设计的。

sentences.english: As soon as the baby cormorant breaks the eggs, it is watched by Damin himself.
sentences.chinese: 小鸬鹚一啄破蛋壳，大明就亲自照看它。

sentences.english: Left to right and so on and so on cock not send red crown to the centipede, they come in person to discuss.
sentences.chinese: 公鸡左等右等不见蜈蚣送红冠来，就亲自上门讨要。

sentences.english: Laureen approves her husband's political views and once canvassed for him.
sentences.chinese: 她赞同丈夫的政治观点，并亲自开车上阵为丈夫助选。
欢迎到华星店亲自看一看。

sentences.english: Rather than dealing with your mail yourself, you can outsource the task.
sentences.chinese: 处理邮件的事你可以申请外援，不必亲自劳神。

sentences.english: He poured wine personally for the soldiers who returned from the battlefield.
sentences.chinese: 他亲自为前线回来的将士斟酒。

sentences.english: In most British pubs, you have to go to the bar to buy drinks.
sentences.chinese: 在大多数英国酒吧，你得亲自到吧台去买酒。

sentences.english: The King of Lu led the army by himself.
sentences.chinese: 鲁国由鲁王亲自带兵迎战。

sentences.english: The non-profit organization's approach is improvisational and personal.
sentences.chinese: 非盈利组织的方法很即兴和亲自的。

sentences.english: It must go in, if I have to push it myself.
sentences.chinese: 如果我亲自推它，他必须到水里去。

sentences.english: Read the documentation or manual that your company provides.
sentences.chinese: 亲自读读你公司提供的文档或是手册。

sentences.english: The revenger of blood himself shall slay the murderer: when he meeteth him, he shall slay him.
sentences.chinese: 报血仇的必亲自杀那故杀人的，一遇见就杀他。

sentences.english: He was part of the battalion's planning team, but he hoped to finish the tour as a front-line company commander.
sentences.chinese: 他是一名营级指挥官，但他想要去前线亲自指挥作战。

sentences.english: Mason decides to interrogate Penticoff himself.
sentences.chinese: 梅森决定亲自审问彭蒂科夫。

definition: to travel to (a place where duty calls)
one's own mouth/fig. in one's own words/to say sth personally
to appear personally/to step in/to step forth/to show up
to help/to lend a hand/to do a favor/to do a good turn
